StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetNumEvents]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@StartDate date.me, @EndDate date.me, @EventSourceId int, @Organiza.onId int, @SubjectId uniqueidentifier = null WITH RECOMPILE AS BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED SET NOCOUNT ON
SELECT DISTINCT e.ID INTO #EventList FROM [RSSOSS].[USMC].[Event] E INNER JOIN [RSSOSS].[USMC].[EventSubject] ESub ON E.ID = ESub.Even.d INNER JOIN [RSSOSS].[USMC].[EventSource] ES ON E.EventSourceId = ES.ID INNER JOIN [RSSOSS].[USMC].[EventType] ET ON E.EventTypeId = ET.ID
WHERE ((@SubjectId = ESub.SubjectId AND @SubjectId IS NOT NULL) OR (@SubjectId IS NULL)) and (@EventSourceId = 0 or (E.EventSourceId = @EventSourceId)) and (@Organiza.onId = 0 or (E.Organiza.onId = @Organiza.onId)) and ( ( @StartDate is null AND @EndDate is null) OR ( (E.StartDate <= @EndDate AND @EndDate IS NOT NULL) AND (E.EndDate >= @StartDate AND @StartDate IS NOT NULL ) ) )
SELECT E.ID, E.Organiza.onId, E.Loca.on, E.Comments, E.IsComplete, E.StartDate, E.EndDate, E.EventTypeOther, E.LastUpdateDate, E.LastUpdateUserId, E.Remarks, E.EventPrecision, EA.MISApprovedEventStartDate, EA.MISApprovedEventEndDate, EA.WISApprovedEventStartDate, EA.WISApprovedEventEndDate, ES.Id EventSourceId, ES.Name EventSourceName, ET.Id EventTypeId, ET.Type EventTypeName INTO #ResultSet FROM [RSSOSS].[USMC].[Event] E INNER JOIN #EventList el ON E.ID = el.ID INNER JOIN [RSSOSS].[USMC].[EventSource] ES ON E.EventSourceId = ES.ID INNER JOIN [RSSOSS].[USMC].[EventType] ET ON E.EventTypeId = ET.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN [RSSOSS].[USMC].[EventApproval] EA on E.ID = EA.ID WHERE (@EventSourceId = 0 or (E.EventSourceId = @EventSourceId)) and (@Organiza.onId = 0 or (E.Organiza.onId = @Organiza.onId)) and ( ( @StartDate is null AND @EndDate is null) OR ( (E.StartDate <= @EndDate AND @EndDate IS NOT NULL) AND (E.EndDate >= @StartDate AND @StartDate IS NOT NULL ) ) ) ORDER BY E.StartDate desc
SELECT count(*) as NumEvents FROM #ResultSet
DROP TABLE #EventList DROP TABLE #ResultSet
SET NOCOUNT OFF
END
